mapper.select: SELECT fno,ftype,ftitle,fcontents,fregdate,fpwd,fhits,customerno FROM (SELECT fno,ftype,ftitle,fcontents,fregdate,fpwd,fhits,customerno FROM faq ORDER BY fno desc) WHERE (ftype = '영화관 이용' or ftype = '관람권')

SELECT nno,ntitle,ncontents,nregdate,nhits,customerno FROM (SELECT rownum rn, nno,ntitle,ncontents,nregdate,nhits,customerno FROM (SELECT nno,ntitle,ncontents,nregdate,nhits,customerno FROM notice ORDER BY nno desc) WHERE rownum < = #{endNo}) WHERE rn > = #{startNo}
SELECT nno,ntitle,ncontents,nregdate,nhits,customerno FROM notice WHERE nno in (4,7)

SELECT fno,ftype,ftitle,fcontents,fregdate,fpwd,fhits,customerno FROM (SELECT rownum rn, fno,ftype,ftitle,fcontents,fregdate,fpwd,fhits,customerno FROM (SELECT fno,ftype,ftitle,fcontents,fregdate,fpwd,fhits,customerno FROM faq ORDER BY fno desc) WHERE rownum < = #{endNo}) WHERE rn > = #{startNo} and ftype = '1:1문의'
SELECT count(*) FROM faq WHERE ftype = '1:1문의'
select ano,acontents,aregdate,fno,customerno,id from answer NATURAL JOIN customer where fno = #{fno} ORDER BY ano
